result.reason: Well-supported UI enhancement to make active connection status more visible in the connection tree via better icons/overlays and bold text, requested by multiple users with contributor buy-in.
result.approach: Add 'Bold Active Connections' option in Appearance settings and update ConnectionTree.FormatCell to apply bold font style to active connections. Enhance StatusImageList overlay logic if feasible.
